elements.title: Panka Pelishek (Wiki - Did u know)
elements.contents: ... that the pianist Panka Pelishek (pictured) was a Heroine of Socialist Labor?

elements.title: a British school inspired by a circus tent (Wiki - Did u know)
elements.contents: ... that while a British school inspired by a circus tent was described as "eclectic and witty", its "plain functional" replacement won an RIBA Award?

elements.title: Triệu Quân Sự (Wiki - Did u know)
elements.contents: ... that Vietnamese prisoner Triệu Quân Sự escaped from jail four times, and was twice caught while playing online games at internet cafés?

elements.title: 29 BC Yellow River flood (Wiki - Did u know)
elements.contents: ... that China's imperial chancellor killed himself after he was blamed for the devastation of the 29 BC Yellow River flood?

elements.title: Ruth El Saffar (Wiki - Did u know)
elements.contents: ... that a hospitalized Ruth El Saffar had to dictate the introduction of her final book to Diana de Armas Wilson, with whom she had co-edited Quixotic Desire?

elements.title: a public service announcement about drunk driving (Wiki - Did u know)
elements.contents: ... that a public service announcement about drunk driving was voted the best television advertisement in New Zealand?

elements.title: Denise Stoklos (Wiki - Did u know)
elements.contents: ... that Denise Stoklos's "essential theatre" involves minimizing her acting methods while maximizing "the power of drama"?

elements.title: Donald Trump applies his own makeup (Wiki - Did u know)
elements.contents: ... that Donald Trump applies his own makeup each day, according to his former press secretary?

elements.title: Spencer Reid (Wiki - Did u know)
elements.contents: ... that where NFL player Spencer Reid is from, "There's no McDonald's. There's no nothing"?

<a href="{{ permalink }}" class="global_url"></a>
<div class="card-content relative">
<picture>
<img src="{{thumbnail}}" alt="" class="w-full h-auto bg-primary" />
</picture>
{{ #hasStatut }}
<div
class="statut absolute top-1/2 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 bg-primary text-white uppercase px-2 py-1">
{{ statut }}
</div>
{{ /hasStatut }}
<div class="tags flex flex-wrap items-center absolute top-0 left-0 p-4 w-full">
{{ #hasFestival }} {{{ festivalHtml }}} {{ /hasFestival }}
{{ #hasType }} {{{ typeHtml }}} {{ /hasType }} 
</div>
<div class="sl-card-hover w-full md:absolute bottom-0 left-0">
{{ #hasTicket }}  
<a href="{{ ticket }}" target="_blank"
class="hidden md:flex booking z-20 h-20 w-20 rounded-full md:border-2 border-white items-center m-4 hover:bg-primary hover:border-primary bg-gray-500 bg-opacity-25">
<p class="text-white text-xs mx-auto font-bold uppercase">réserver</p>
</a>
{{ /hasTicket }}
{{ #hasMusiquesOrDisciplines }}
<div class="hidden md:flex hover-vignette md:bg-white disciplines text-xl md:text-sm md:border-t md:border-r md:border-l border-black py-2 md:px-4">
{{ #hasDisciplines }} {{{ disciplinesHtml }}} {{ /hasDisciplines }}
{{ #hasMusiquesAndDisciplines }} / {{ /hasMusiquesAndDisciplines }}
{{ #hasMusiques }} {{{ musiquesHtml }}} {{ /hasMusiques }}
</div>
{{ /hasMusiquesOrDisciplines }}
<div class="hover-vignette md:bg-white groupe-date md:border  border-black text-xl md:text-sm md:px-4 pt-2 md:py-2 flex flex-wrap justify-between md:justify-start">
<p class="date mr-2">{{ start_day_text }} <span class="bold">{{ start_day_number }}</span> {{ #hasNotEndDate }} {{ start_hour }} {{ /hasNotEndDate }}
{{ #hasEndDate }} > {{ end_day_text }} <span class="bold">{{ end_day_number }}</span> {{ /hasEndDate }}
</p>
<p class="hidden md:block bold lieu">{{ place }}</p>
{{ #hasTicket }} <a href="{{ ticket }}" target="_blank" class="md:hidden z-20 hover:text-primary"><i class="fal fa-ticket-alt text-2xl"></i></a> {{ /hasTicket }}
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="card-infos mt-2">
{{ #hasTitle }}<h3 class="title bold">{{title}}</h3>{{ /hasTitle }}
{{ #hasSubtitle }}<p class="subtitle text-xl lg:text-lg">{{subtitle}}</p> {{ /hasSubtitle }}
<p class="authors regular pt-2">{{ author }}</p>
</div>
</div> <div class="type rounded-full pt-1 py-0.5 px-3 mr-2 mb-2" style="background-color:{{ color }}">{{ name }}</div> <div class="festival rounded-full pt-1 py-0.5 px-3 mr-2 mb-2" style="background-color:{{ color }}">{{ name }}</div> <p> {{ name }} </p> <p> {{ name }} </p> (Th^ Corn)
